name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Forwarding: When using an Apple phone, before being controlled/the phone is taken away, press and hold the volume button and the side button to enable forced password unlocking. The face unlocking will become invalid. This way, the other party will have almost no way to use tools to unlock your phone without you revealing the password.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens discovered that Li Yongle’s Bilibili and YouTube had deleted the previous video that popularized the science of Fukushima nuclear waste water.

On the morning of September 7, the Shanxi Provincial Department of Justice notified lawyers in the jurisdiction that they were not allowed to make comments on the "Public Security Administration Punishment Law (Draft Amendment)" at will.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 8, some netizens dug out the serious "Japanese" elements in domestic dramas over the years.
It can be seen that the domestic costume film and television drama industry has been seriously hurting the feelings of the Chinese nation for a long time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hu Xijin commented on Wang Fang's singing at the Uriupol Theater, saying that this should be defined as a personal act and has nothing to do with the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 8, Phoenix.com interviewed tourists from all over the world who were traveling in Japan and asked them whether they would buy Fukushima fish products. All of them said "I don't mind." As a result, the topic has been banned and the original video submitted by Phoenix.com has also been deleted.

Netizen contribution
On September 9, during the freshman ideological safety education class at Nanjing University, a police officer gave freshmen a popular science lecture on the dangers of "LGBT" and "extreme feminism".
He also warned students not to "climb over the wall".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 9, after the flood in Fuzhou, the car was soaked and could not be moved. Although a label was posted during the towing process, the traffic police still issued 3 tickets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 9, Kaifeng, Henan, an old man seeks justice on the street

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, Jinan News Comprehensive Channel reported that under the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, Jinan's Baotu Spring has continued to gush for 20 years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In order to stimulate the property market, Nanjing launched the "Nanjing Six Measures", which provide housing subsidies of 1.5%-4% to all districts except the main urban area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 8, a sophomore student from the No. 1 Senior High School in Ningling County, Shangqiu City, Henan Province, distributed leaflets in the square during break time, smeared red ink on his body, and shouted under the national flag, demanding "four days of work and three days off, half-price canteen, free tuition for the second year of high school, and the school leaders apologize to all the second-year students." He was then taken away by school personnel and police. It is said that the school only has one and a half days of rest every three weeks, and requires students to go to class for morning reading at 5:30 in the morning, then go out for exercise at 6 o'clock, and leave school at 9:50 in the evening. "There is no supporting resources of Hengshui, but it has Hengshui's diseases," said the students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The handwritten flyer distributed by the student:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 9, Hainan universities issued a notice
According to the relevant requirements of the state and provincial departments, each student must have a copy of the textbook of the course "Introduction to Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era".
And school personnel said that the provincial department also conducted a survey and put forward a requirement that no matter whether the book is in hand or not, the book must be ordered again through the "book selection platform".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Don't be a slave, be a citizen!
On September 9, Hu Chenfeng, a domestic video author who had previously gone viral and been banned many times for his "100 yuan purchasing power" video, released a video titled "Facing the Draft Amendment to the Public Security Administration Punishment Law - This is what Hu Chenfeng did."
In the video, he publicly expressed his opinions on the "Draft Amendment to the Public Security Administration Punishment Law" and mailed the draft opinion to the National People's Congress.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 8, the Chinese Human Rights Network released a Douyin video titled "How is human rights in China?" However, only fans were allowed to comment in the comment section, which caused ridicule.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Can't see who I am? Fang Zhouzi, didn't you take the lead in opening the box of my white paper movement the next day? You can't prove anything except that I am an international student.
On the one hand, you said that you don't allow others to forward my tweets, but on the other hand, you stole my materials and pictures. Are you afraid that your behavior of stealing pictures will be discovered by your followers?
Oh, of course, you don't have many fans. Data will not lie. Not only do you have low account traffic, but you are also known as the second in China (once the first) with 850,000 followers. You revealed that your Twitter income is only $100 per month, which is not as good as one-third of my small account. This shows that your actual number of real followers is less than 50,000.
You spread rumors all day that I bought fans. Facts have proved that the biggest water injection account in the entire China Twitter circle is you.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Loan to work" becomes a reality
On September 9, the media broke the news that Henan Zhengzhou Yuren Group has been asking employees to apply for loans from Zhengzhou Rural Commercial Bank for corporate use since 2019.
